text: Mrs. Black Is Back is a 1914 American comedy-drama movie directed by Thomas N. Heffron and starring May Irwin, Charles Willis Lane, Clara Blandick, Wellington A. Playter, Elmer Booth, Marie Pavis, Cyril Chadwick. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1914 comedy movies Category:1914 drama movies Category:1910s comedy-drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Thomas N. Heffron Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Mrs. Black Is Back
